dct_title_s: Le plan de Paris, ses faubourgs et ses environs
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially. Originally published in Paris in 1716. Shows selected named buildings (some in perspective), gardens, fields.
dct_publisher_sm: A Amsterdam : Chez Iean Cóvens & Corneille Mortier, [1730?]
